verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: spent] [ARG1: his life] [ARG2: under the assumption that as long as he had his goons do his dirty work and as long as he was willing to bankrupt himself to stay out of prison that everything would work out … and as it does with most white men born with millions] ...
